text: "Hard" is the second single from Rihanna's album Rated R. It features Jeezy. It went to number 8 in the United States, number 42 in the United Kingdom, number 9 in Canada, number 15 in New Zealand and number 51 in Australia. ==Format and track listing== ;Digital download (the remixes) #"Hard" (Jump Smokers radio edit) – 3:10 #"Hard" (Chew Fu granite fix radio edit) – 3:43 #"Hard" (Jody den Broeder radio edit) – 3:30 #"Hard" (Jump Smokers extended) – 3:36 #"Hard" (Chew Fu granite fix extended) – 5:27 #"Hard" (Jody den Broeder club Remix) – 6:43 #"Hard" (Jody den Broeder dub) – 6:45 ==References== Category:2009 songs Category:Rihanna songs
title: Hard (Rihanna song)
